activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order

records.addlTxt:
1:40 PM  Defendant Drewdell Charles Mitchell in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Drewdell Charles Mitchell.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court Wisconsin. 

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS CASES 21CM133, 22CM29, 22CM179, 22CM200 AND 22CT35

Defense moves to quash warrants in above cases; Court grants motion.
Bonds are reinstated. Hearing scheduled for all above November 9, 2022 at 10:00 am. before Judge Boyle.
Hearing scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:40 Defendant Drewdell Charles Mitchell not in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Drewdell Charles Mitchell. John O'Boyle appears for the state.  This covers 21CM133, 22CM29, 22CM179, 22CT35, 22TR306, 22TR308, 22TR309, & 22TR649.  Victim appears by Zoom and indicates DE is in Wisconsin Dells.  Attorney Rockow relates.  State moves for warrant. Court authorizes bench warrant, body only, statewide.

4:02 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Drewdell Charles Mitchell appeared by video.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Drewdell Charles Mitchell. 

THIS COVERS 22CT35, 21CM133, 22CM29, 21TR649, 22TR306, 22TR308, and 22TR309. 

Break out room. Attorney Rockow relates and requests a new plea date. State requests the court set the hearing for trial. State would oppose any bond modification. Defense would request that these not be set for hearings. 


21CM133 -  Counsel will need to schedule the JT with Judge Boyle's JA. 

22CT35 -  Set for status hearing 10/21/2022 at 10:00 AM. 

22CM29 - Set for status hearing 10/21/2022 at 10:00 AM. 


21TR649, 22TR306, 22TR308, and 22TR309 to track with the criminal files. 


CC: BC Jail
Status hearing scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Plea/sentencing hearing on July 8, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
NOH sent to Def at Barron Co Jail

10:50 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Drewdell Charles Mitchell. 

THIS COVERS 22CT35, 21TR649, 22TR309, 21CM133, 22CM29, 22TR308, 22TR306

Set for plea hearing 7/8/22 at 4 :00 PM. 

CC: BC Jail
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 8, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

records.addlTxt:
9:08AM Defendant Drewdell Charles Mitchell appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow in court for Drewdell Charles Mitchell and was just appointed.  Attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for State of Wisconsin. 
COVERS 21CM133, 22CT35, 22CM29, 21TR649, 22TR306, 22TR308 & 22TR309.  
9:10 am Attorney Rockow and Defendant put in a breakout room. 9:19 a.m. Back on the record.  
22CT35 - Formal reading of Complaint waived.  Not guilty plea entered. 22CM29 - Formal reading of Complaint waived.  Not guilty plea entered. TR's Not guilty pleas also entered. All files set before Judge Bitney for Hearing for June 24, 2022 @ 10:00 a.m.   Bail continues.

Hearing scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Adjourned initial appearance on April 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.
NOH sent to Def at Barron Co Jail
Jail notified of hearing

ADDRESS INFO for Drewdell Charles Mitchell
Current: 2606 8th Ave, Chetek, WI 54728 United States  (Effective: 03-21-2022)
Prior: 2606 8th St, Cumberland, WI 54829

If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 


BOND COVERS 22CT35 & 22CM29 and now also 21CM133.
Must maintain absolute sobriety. 
Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages.
May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold for consumption on the premises. 
Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license or permit. 
Must have no contact with N.B.B. dob 03/15/1997

1:19 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Drewdell Charles Mitchell appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Andrew T Knaak for Drewdell Charles Mitchell appeared by video. 
COVERS 22CT35, (INIT), 22CM29 (INIT), 21CM133 and 21CM67 - Warrants.

21CM67 - State requests that the Defendant serve 5 days jail for failure to complete community service.  Attorney Knaak relates.  Court relates, grants State's request, and that Defendant has served 4 days and one day left to serve.  Warrant is quashed.
21CM133 - Warrant quashed.  Hearing set for 04/01/2022 at 9:00 a.m. along with other files.
22CM29, 22CT35 - Initial Appearances today and State requests cash bond to cover 22CM29 and 22CT35.  1:26 pm. Defendant and Attorney Knaak put in a breakout room to discuss bond.  1:29 p.m. Back on the record.  Attorney Knaak requests lower cash bond. Address and phone number updated in 22CT35 and to be updated in all files.  BOND SET IS ALSO TO INCLUDE 21CM133 now.  Bond to be amended in that file.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.
